name: 2017 International Conference on Mechanical, Material and Aerospace Engineering (2MAE 2017)
content: Welcome to 2017 International Conference on Mechanical, Material and Aerospace Engineering (2MAE 2017). 2MAE 2017 is organized by Hong Kong Society of Mechanical Engineers, sponsored by Beijing Jiaotong University. The conference will be held in Beijing Jiaotong University, Beijing, China, from 12-14, May, 2017! ●Publication and Indexing All the registered and presented papers will be published on the conference proceeding of 2MAE 2017, indexed by Elsevier: SCOPUS, Index Copernicus Journals Master List, Google Scholar, Ei Compendex (CPX), Cambridge Scientific Abstracts (CSA), Inspec (IET, Institution of Engineering Technology), SCImago Journal & Country Rank (SJR), EBSCO, Thomson Reuters (WoS). ●Confirmed Speakers: Prof. Xiaoping Liu, Beijing Jiaotong University, China Prof. Xin Zhang, Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, Hong Kong ●Papers are invited to submit to 2MAE 2017 in the following (non-exclusive) topics: \*\* Aerospace Mechatronics and Avionics Systems Advanced theoretical models Advances in aerospace technology Aerodynamic’s fundamental concepts Aerospace robotics and mechatronics Aerospace Communications Aircraft Navigation Astronomical Image Processing Attitude maneuver control ●Paper Submission 1, Papers can be submitted as PDF via EasyChair: http://www.easychair.org/conferences/?conf=2mae2017 2, You can also choose to submit your paper directly to 2mae@smehk.org 3, Contributions must be written in English and report on original, unpublished work not submitted for publication elsewhere. Submissions not adhering to the above specified constraints may be rejected without review. ●CONTACT US Ms. Tiffany Chang Tel:+852-30697937 Email: 2mae@smehk.org Website: http://www.2mae.org/
